test.query: SELECT number % 10000 AS k, uniq(number) AS u FROM numbers_mt(1e7) GROUP BY k ORDER BY u DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT number % 10000 AS k, count(number) AS u FROM numbers_mt(3*1e9) GROUP BY k ORDER BY u DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT number % 10000 AS k, sum(number) AS u FROM numbers_mt(1e9) GROUP BY k ORDER BY u DESC LIMIT 10
